title: raamachandra ni dhaya
sahitya:
rAmacandra nI daya rAma ElarA daya

anupallavi

 kAmakOTi sundarAkAra dhrta mandAra prEmamIra mundara biluva rAka undurA

caraNam1

  kAnanambu tapamO kaikamIdi kOpamO nEnu jEyu pApamO nIku shakti lOpamO
   
caraNam 2


 ADadanna rOsamO alanADu pAsamO mEDalEni vAsamO mEmu sEyu dOSamO
   
caraNam 3

 kallalaina nEyamA kaNTE nIku hEyamA tallaDilla nyAyamA tyAgarAja gEyamA
